adjectives.description: triquetrous (comparative more triquetrous, superlative most triquetrous)

entries.meaning: Triangular; especially (in natural sciences), having a triangular cross-section.
examples: the lithostrata or figured pavements of the ancients  [â€¦]  consisted not all of square stones, but were divided into triquetrous segments, honey-combs, and sexangular figures, according to Vitruvius
